altername_name: Close Encounters of the Worst Kind
name: Close Encounters
overview: Close Encounters of the Worst Kind is a vertical shooter, published by Mr Computer Products, which was released in 1983. Close Encounters of the Worst Kind is a 1 - 2 player arcade game for multiple systems. The players each control a small ship at the bottom of the screen, and can move laterally and fire vertically forwards. The player must destroy a number of rapidly incoming alien vessels, as well as a spaceship that moves laterally on the top of the screen and fires towards the player.
